strategies.name: Matrix Aggressive Maximizer
strategies.strategy: Demand high percentages for yourself (40%+), use minimal vote trading, make aggressive requests

strategies.name: Matrix Diplomatic Builder
strategies.strategy: Propose balanced allocations (20-30% for all), make generous offers, build alliances through vote trading

strategies.name: Matrix Strategic Calculator
strategies.strategy: Use mathematical optimization, analyze matrix patterns, make calculated offers based on probability

strategies.name: Matrix Smart Opportunist
strategies.strategy: Adapt your matrix based on what others propose, form temporary alliances, exploit weaknesses
